headline: Maria ELLOCO del MARTILLO
author: Gary
content: Maria Elloco arrived at the restaurant well-dressed, wearing a double mask and a facial shield. She ordered her favorite dish, 'arroz a la jardinera' with a piece of pork belly and a salad of lettuce, lemon, and pickles. For drink, she requested a jarra of chicha morada. During their conversation, Gary mentioned encountering the legendary journalist 'EI Sonambuló'. Gary also shared that in July, it will be 120 years since the terrible crime committed by Basombrio Pendavis, an alum of Colegio Sanla Mariá. He had inexplicably killed his best friend's sister, the beautiful teenager Alezandra Brenes (16).
